name: Rolling Dice Puzzle
description:
This puzzle game is basically what happens when someone makes a puzzle game out of rotating a dice.

It's a pretty bad game, but for my first time participating in a game jam I'd say it's OK.

CONTROLS:

move: W, A, S, D

undo:Z

GOAL:Get the dice to the exit with the matching number on top.

Note: the ARM builds don't have the JRE built-in, so you'll have to install Java 17 on your system. The X86 builds (Windows and Linux) don't have this issue.
